docs.text: xpath description valueType exampleValues mappingRequired /rss https://www.rssboard.org/rss-draft-1#element-rss n/a n/a no /rss/channel https://www.rssboard.org/rss-draft-1#element-channel n/a n/a no /rss/channel/item[*] https://www.rssboard.org/rss-draft-1#element-channel-item xs:complexType n/a no /rss/channel/item[*]/ @amg :type Type of media item. Whether it a feature or an episode of serties etc xs:enumeration "{Feature Episode}" "Feature" no /rss/channel/item[*]/amg:assetid Asset id assigned in the publisher's CMS xs:string "123456" no /rss/channel/item[*]/amg:broadcastDate https://www.ebu.ch/metadata/ontologies/ebucore/ebucore_dateBroadcast.html xs:string "2019-01-01" no /rss/channel/item[ ]/amg:cuepoint[ ] Identifies the cue point in seconds offset. Cue points are places in time where an ad can be inserted in the video xs:float 60.320 no /rss/channel/item[ ]/amg:keyword[ ] Highly relevant keywords describing the media object. Max 10 elements Ref: https://www.rssboard.org/media-rss#media-keywords xs:string "prison" no /rss/channel/item[*]/amg:longDescription Long description describing media object xs:string "movie on stock. Set in time persion 1929-1935" no /rss/channel/item[*]/amg:rights Element to express rights associated with the media object xs:complexType n/a no /rss/channel/item[*]/amg:rights/amg:rightsEndDateTime series specific information xs:complexType n/a no /rss/channel/item[*]/amg:series/amg:broadcastDate Date when series was aired first. https://www.ebu.ch/metadata/ontologies/ebucore/ebucore_dateBroadcast.html xs:string "2019-01-01" no /rss/channel/item[ ]/amg:series/amg:keyword[ ] Highly relevant keywords describing the series. /rss/channel/item[*]/amg:series/amg:seriesDescription Description of the series xs:string "A prison drama" no /rss/channel/item[*]/amg:series/amg:seriesThumbnail Url pointing to series specific thumbnail xs:anyUri " https://www.example.com/series.jpg " no /rss/channel/item[*]/amg:series/amg:seriesTitle Title of the series xs:string "Prison Break" no /rss/channel/item[ ]/amgt:genre[ ] Genre of the media object. https://www.ebu.ch/metadata/ontologies/ebucore/ebucore_Genre.html xs:anyUri " http://www.ebu.ch/metadata/ontologies/skos/ebu_ContentGenreCS#_3.4 " no /rss/channel/item[*]/media:description Short description of the media object xs:string "A prison drama" no /rss/channel/item[*]/media:group https://www.rssboard.org/media-rss#media-group xs:complexType n/a no /rss/channel/item[*]/media:group/media:content https://www.rssboard.org/media-rss#media-content xs:complexType n/a no /rss/channel/item[*]/media:group/media:content/ @bitrate kilobits per second rate of media object xs:integer "1000" no /rss/channel/item[*]/media:group/media:content/ @duration the number of seconds the media object plays xs:integer "1500" no /rss/channel/item[*]/media:group/media:content/ @fileSize the number of bytes of the media object xs:integer "1000000" no /rss/channel/item[*]/media:group/media:content/ @framerate the number of frames per second for the media object xs:integer "30" no /rss/channel/item[*]/media:group/media:content/ @height the height of the media object xs:integer "1080" no /rss/channel/item[*]/media:group/media:content/ @amg :lang the primary language encapsulated in the media object as specified in https://www.ebu.ch/metadata/ontologies/skos/ebu_ISO639_2LanguageCodeCS.rdf xs:anyUri " http://www.ebu.ch/metadata/ontologies/skos/ebu_Iso639_2LanguageCS#_eng " no /rss/channel/item[*]/media:group/media:content/ @medium the type of object that is encased in the media object xs:enumeration "video" no /rss/channel/item[*]/media:group/media:content/ @type the standard MIME type of the object xs:string "video/mp4" no /rss/channel/item[*]/media:group/media:content/ @url should specify the direct URL to the media object xs:anyUri " https://www.example.com/video.mp4 " no /rss/channel/item[*]/media:group/media:content/ @width the width of the media object xs:integer "1920" no /rss/channel/item[*]/media:thumbnail https://www.rssboard.org/media-rss#media-thumbnails xs:complexType n/a no /rss/channel/item[*]/media:thumbnail/ @url specifies the url of the thumbnail xs:anyUri " https://www.example.com/thumbnail.jpg " no /rss/channel/item[*]/media:thumbnail/ @height specifies the height of the thumbnail xs:integer "1080" no /rss/channel/item[*]/media:thumbnail/ @width specifies the width of the thumbnail xs:integer "1920" no /rss/channel/item[*]/media:title https://www.rssboard.org/media-rss#media-title xs:string "Prison Break" no /rss/channel/item[ ]/media:credit[ ] https://www.rssboard.org/media-rss#media-credit xs:complexType n/a no /rss/channel/item[ ]/media:credit[ ]/ @amg :role Role as defined in http://www.ebu.ch/metadata/ontologies/skos/ebu_RoleCodeCS.rdf xs:anyUri " http://www.ebu.ch/metadata/ontologies/skos/ebu_RoleCodeCS#_25.9 " yes /rss/channel/item[ ]/media:credit[ ]/ @scheme Fixed value https://www.ebu.ch/metadata/ontologies/skos/ebu_RoleCodeCS.htm xs:anyUri " https://www.ebu.ch/metadata/ontologies/skos/ebu_RoleCodeCS.htm " no /rss/channel/item[*]/media:rating https://www.rssboard.org/media-rss#media-rating Rating value will belong to https://www.ebu.ch/metadata/ontologies/skos/ebu_ParentalGuidanceCode.rdf xs:anyUri " http://www.ebu.ch/metadata/ontologies/skos/ebu_ParentalGuidanceCode#_14 " no /rss/channel/item[*]/media:rating/ @scheme Fixed value https://www.ebu.ch/metadata/ontologies/skos/ebu_PictureDisplayFormatCodeCS.htm xs:anyUri " https://www.ebu.ch/metadata/ontologies/skos/ebu_PictureDisplayFormatCodeCS.htm " no /rss/channel/item[*]/media:subTitle https://www.rssboard.org/media-rss#media-subtitle n/a n/a no /rss/channel/item[*]/media:subTitle/ @href specifies the url of the subtitle xs:anyUri " https://www.example.com/subtitle.srt " no /rss/channel/item[*]/media:subTitle/ @amg :lang specifies the language of the subtitle as defiend in https://www.ebu.ch/metadata/ontologies/skos/ebu_ISO639_2LanguageCodeCS.rdf xs:anyUri " http://www.ebu.ch/metadata/ontologies/skos/ebu_Iso639_2LanguageCS#_eng " no /rss/channel/item[*]/media:subTitle/ @type the standard MIME type of the object xs:string "text/srt" no

docs.text: ebucore.rdf: Downloaded from https://www.ebu.ch/metadata/ontologies/ebucore/ebucore.rdf ebucore.ttl: Converted from ebucore.rdf using riot riot --out=TURTLE ebucore.rdf > ebucore.ttl
docs.title: Readme

docs.text: Naming Conventions ¶ ebu_[A-Za-z0-9]*CS.rdf: RDF/XML serialization of EBU published Concept Scheme amagi_ebu_[A-Za-z0-9]*CS.rdf: RDF/XML serialization of Amagi defined Concept Schemes using ebucore rdfs ebu_[A-Za-z0-9]*CS_amgext.rdf: RDF/XML serialization of EBU published Concept Scheme, that has been extended by adding more skos triples. Files in folder ¶ ebu_ContentGenreCS.rdf : Source -> http://www.ebu.ch/metadata/ontologies/skos/ebu_ContentGenreCS.rdf ebu_RoleCodeCS.rdf : Source -> http://www.ebu.ch/metadata/ontologies/skos/ebu_RoleCodeCS.rdf ebu_Iso3166_CountryCodeCS.rdf : Source -> https://www.ebu.ch/metadata/ontologies/skos/ebu_Iso3166_CountryCodeCS.rdf Json representations ¶ json/role_skos.json : Command to generate amgrss-tool ebucs-rdf-2-json -i /Users/shashidhar/sb_work/sb_github/metadata/skos/ebu_RoleCodeCS_amgext.rdf -p all -n 5,17,20,25,28 -o role.json json/asset_type_skos.json : Command to generate amgrss-tool ebucs-rdf-2-json -i /Users/shashidhar/sb_work/sb_github/metadata/skos/amagi_ebu_AssetTypeCS.rdf -o asset_type.json json/genre_skos.json : Json representation of ebu_ContentGenreCS_amgext.rdf json/parental_guidance_skos.json : Json representation of ebu_ParentalGuidanceCodeCS_amgext.rdf RDF compare ¶ rdfdiff : Jena cli tool. Install instructions rdfdiff ebu_ContentGenreCS_amgext.rdf ebu_ContentGenreCS.rdf rdf/xml rdf/xml | sort
docs.title: Readme
